tool_description: Re-letter words to create spooky sentences.
name: Re-letter
title: Re-letter

api_list.name: sentence
api_list.url: https://re-letter.p.rapidapi.com/Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation.
api_list.description: This will return the jumbled sentence.

required_parameters.name: sentence
required_parameters.default: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://re-letter.p.rapidapi.com/Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation."

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "re-letter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://re-letter.p.rapidapi.com/{sentence}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "re-letter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
